article_title: Ohio’s projected year-end surplus grows despite tax cuts
article_text:
Total Access

article_metadata.description: Even as projected revenue is reduced because of new income-tax cuts, the state budget office now estimates the state will finish the fiscal year with nearly $632 million more than it will spend.
